courseSectionInformation: 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: CEE 380.
description: Analysis and design of foundations, bearing capacity and settlement of foundations; stability of excavations and slopes; ground movements due to construction; analysis and design of excavations, retaining walls, slopes, and underground structures in soil and rock. 3 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. Prerequisite: CEE 380.
label: Foundation Engineering
